subject: Attention: Christopher !!!!!! From Bangkok Bank Thailand
body:
Bangkok Bank Thailand, 919/1 อาคาร Jewelry
Trade Center ซอย สุรศักดิ์ ชั้น 6-B1 Si Lom, Silom,
Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500
REF: - PAYMENT CODE: ECB/066
Tel: +66 (064-798-6990)
Tel: +66 (084-106-5215)



Attention: Beneficiary, Christopher

Official Notice: Mr. Christopher, this is to officially inform you Today that we receive and acknowledge receipt of your email with content well noted concerning the release of your approved funds worth US$5.000.000.00, Five Million United States Dollars Only from United Nations and World Bank.

Regarding this notice: we wish to inform you that this fund was approved after the covid 19 pandemic as the Authorities released and authorized the dispatched of these funds to help the poor and other Societies.

Take Note: you are advised to visit some orphanage homes and distribute some of the funds to the poor.

Note: the fund will be release to you through an online bank account with an ATM Debit Card which will be delivered to your home address.

Furthermore, you can transfer money from your online bank account to any other bank account of your choice.

Get back to us immediately when you receive this email for record purpose.

Thank you for choosing Bangkok Bank Thailand. We appreciate the Opportunity to serve you. Do not hesitate to ask question (s) where you consider necessary for clarification.

             CONGRATULATIONS!

Thanks, and God bless you,

Sincerely yours,
Mrs. Samir EL Saleh
CEO / Head of Transaction & Transfer Department
